00014 typedef struct parser_ctx_t {
00015   sxml_stack_t* stack;
00016   dfsch_sxml_parser_params_t* params;
00017   dfsch_object_t* res;

00020 struct sxml_stack_t {
00021   sxml_stack_t* next;
00022   dfsch_object_t* head;
00023   dfsch_object_t* tail;
00024 };
00025 
00026 static XML_Memory_Handling_Suite gc_suite = {
00027   GC_malloc,
00028   GC_realloc,
00029   GC_free
00030 };
00031 
00032 DFSCH_LOCAL_SYMBOL_CACHE("@", at_symbol);
00033 
00034 static void sxml_push(parser_ctx_t* c, dfsch_object_t* tag){
00035   sxml_stack_t* s = GC_NEW(stack_t);
00036   s->next = c->stack;
00037   s->head = s->tail = dfsch_cons(tag, NULL);
00038   c->stack = s;
00039 }
00040 static void sxml_append(parser_ctx_t* c, dfsch_object_t* o){
00041   if (!c->stack){
00042     c->res = o;    
00043   } else { 
00044     dfsch_object_t* p = dfsch_cons(o, NULL);
00045     DFSCH_FAST_CDR_MUT(c->stack->tail) = p;
00046     c->stack->tail = p;
00047   }
00048 }
00049 static void sxml_pop(parser_ctx_t* c){
00050   dfsch_object_t* l = c->stack->head;
00051   c->stack = c->stack->next;
00052   sxml_append(c, l);
00053 }
00054 
00055 static XMLCALL void start_element_handler(parser_ctx_t* c, 
00056                                           char *name,
00057                                           char **attrs){
00058   sxml_push(c, dfsch_make_symbol(name));
00059   if (*attrs){
00060     dfsch_object_t* a_list = NULL;
00061     while (*attrs){
00062       a_list = dfsch_cons(dfsch_list(2,
00063                                      dfsch_make_symbol(*attrs),
00064                                      dfsch_make_string_cstr(*(attrs+1))),
00065                           a_list);
00066       attrs+=2;
00067     }
00068     sxml_append(c, dfsch_cons(at_symbol(), a_list));
00069   }
00070 }
00071 static XMLCALL void end_element_handler(parser_ctx_t* c, 
00072                                         char *name){
00073   sxml_pop(c);
00074 }
00075 
00076 static XMLCALL void character_data_handler(parser_ctx_t* c, 
00077                                            char *data,
00078                                            int len){
00079   if (dfsch_string_p(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(c->stack->tail))){
00080     dfsch_strbuf_t* o = dfsch_string_to_buf(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(c->stack->tail));
00081     char* buf = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(len+o->len);
00082     memcpy(buf, o->ptr, o->len);
00083     memcpy(buf+o->len, data, len);
00084 
00085     DFSCH_FAST_CAR(c->stack->tail) = dfsch_make_string_buf(buf, len+o->len);
00086   } else {
00087     sxml_append(c, dfsch_make_string_buf(data, len));
00088   }
00089 }
00090 
00091 static dfsch_sxml_parser_params_t default_parser_params = {
00092   0,
00093   NULL,
00094   0
00095 };
00096 
00097 static XML_Parser sxml_init(dfsch_sxml_parser_params_t* params){
00098   XML_Parser p;
00099   parser_ctx_t* c;
00100   static char sep = ':';
00101 
00102   if (!params){
00103     params = &default_parser_params;
00104   }
00105 
00106   p = XML_ParserCreate_MM(params->encoding, &gc_suite, 
00107                           params->namespaces ? &sep : NULL);
00108 
00109   c = GC_NEW(parser_ctx_t);
00110   c->params = params;
00111   c->stack = NULL;
00112   XML_SetUserData(p, c);
00113   XML_SetElementHandler(p, 
00114                         (XML_StartElementHandler)start_element_handler, 
00115                         (XML_EndElementHandler)end_element_handler);
00116   XML_SetCharacterDataHandler(p,
00117                               (XML_CharacterDataHandler)character_data_handler);
00118 
00119   
00120 
00121   return p;
00122 }
00123 
00124 static dfsch_object_t* sxml_done(XML_Parser p){
00125   parser_ctx_t* c = XML_GetUserData(p);
00126   assert(!c->stack);
00127   return c->res;
00128 }
00129 
00130 #define BUFFER_LENGTH 4096
00131 
00132 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_sxml_parse_file(char* filename,
00133                                           dfsch_sxml_parser_params_t* params){
00134   XML_Parser p = sxml_init(params);
00135   FILE* f;
00136   size_t r;
00137   char* buf;
00138 
00139   f = fopen(filename, "r");
00140   if (!f){
00141     dfsch_error("Cannot open file", 
00142                 dfsch_list(2,
00143                            dfsch_make_string_cstr(filename),
00144                            dfsch_make_string_cstr(strerror(errno))));
00145     
00146   }
00147 
00148   while ((!feof(f)) && (!ferror(f))){
00149     buf = XML_GetBuffer(p, BUFFER_LENGTH);
00150     r = fread(buf, 1, BUFFER_LENGTH, f);
00151     
00152     if (XML_ParseBuffer(p, r, 0) != XML_STATUS_OK){
00153       fclose(f);
00154       dfsch_xml_signal_error(p);
00155     }
00156   }
00157   if (ferror(f)){
00158     dfsch_object_t* tmp = dfsch_list(2,
00159                                      dfsch_make_string_cstr(filename),
00160                                      dfsch_make_string_cstr(strerror(errno)));
00161     fclose(f);
00162     dfsch_error("Error reading file", tmp);
00163   }
00164   
00165   fclose(f);  
00166   if (XML_Parse(p, NULL, 0, 1) != XML_STATUS_OK){
00167     dfsch_xml_signal_error(p);
00168   }
00169 
00170   return sxml_done(p);
00171 }
00172 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_sxml_parse_port(dfsch_object_t* port,
00173                                           dfsch_sxml_parser_params_t* params){
00174   XML_Parser p = sxml_init(params);
00175   size_t r;
00176   char* buf;
00177 
00178   while (1){
00179     buf = XML_GetBuffer(p, BUFFER_LENGTH);
00180 
00181     r = dfsch_port_read_buf(port, buf, BUFFER_LENGTH);
00182     if (r==0){
00183       break;
00184     }
00185 
00186     if (XML_ParseBuffer(p, r, 0) != XML_STATUS_OK){
00187       dfsch_xml_signal_error(p);
00188     }
00189   } 
00190 
00191   if (XML_Parse(p, NULL, 0, 1) != XML_STATUS_OK){
00192     dfsch_xml_signal_error(p);
00193   }
00194  
00195   return sxml_done(p);
00196 }
00197 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_sxml_parse_buf(char* buf, size_t len,
00198                                          dfsch_sxml_parser_params_t* params){
00199   XML_Parser p = sxml_init(params);
00200   if (XML_Parse(p, buf, len, 1) != XML_STATUS_OK){
00201     dfsch_xml_signal_error(p);
00202   }
00203   return sxml_done(p);
00204 }
00205 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_sxml_parse_strbuf(dfsch_strbuf_t* b,
00206                                             dfsch_sxml_parser_params_t* params){
00207   return dfsch_sxml_parse_buf(b->ptr, b->len, params);
00208 }
00209 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_sxml_parse_cstr(char* s,
00210                                           dfsch_sxml_parser_params_t* params){
00211   return dfsch_sxml_parse_buf(s, strlen(s), params);
00212 }

00214 dfsch_sxml_parser_params_t* dfsch_sxml_parser_params(dfsch_object_t* args){
00215   dfsch_sxml_parser_params_t* p = GC_NEW(dfsch_sxml_parser_params_t);
00216   DFSCH_KEYWORD_PARSER_BEGIN(args);
00217   DFSCH_KEYWORD_GENERIC("namespaces", p->namespaces, DFSCH_TRUE_P);
00218   DFSCH_KEYWORD_GENERIC("encoding", p->encoding, dfsch_string_to_cstr);
00219   DFSCH_KEYWORD_GENERIC("collapse-whitespace", 
00220                         p->collapse_whitespace, DFSCH_TRUE_P);
00221   DFSCH_KEYWORD_PARSER_END(args);
00222   return p;
00223 }

00225 typedef void (*write_cb_t)(void* target, char* buf);
00226 typedef struct emitter_t {
00227   dfsch_sxml_emitter_params_t* params;
00228   void* target;
00229   write_cb_t write;
00230 
00231   int start_col;
00232 } emitter_t;

00234 static emitter_t* emit_init(dfsch_sxml_emitter_params_t* params,
00235                             void* target,
00236                             write_cb_t write){
00237   emitter_t* e = GC_NEW(emitter_t);
00238   e->params = params;
00239   e->target = target;
00240   e->write = write;
00241   e->start_col = 0;
00242   return e;
00243 } 
00244 
00245 static void emit_attrs(emitter_t* e, dfsch_object_t* attrs){
00246   while (DFSCH_PAIR_P(attrs)){
00247     dfsch_object_t* a = DFSCH_FAST_CAR(attrs);
00248     char *name;
00249     char *value;
00250 
00251     switch (dfsch_list_length(a, NULL)){
00252     case 1:
00253       name = dfsch_symbol(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(a));
00254       e->write(e->target, dfsch_saprintf(" %s=\"%s\"", name, name));
00255       break;
00256     case 2:
00257       name = dfsch_symbol(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(a));
00258       a = DFSCH_FAST_CDR(a);
00259       value = dfsch_string_to_cstr(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(a));
00260       e->write(e->target, dfsch_saprintf(" %s=\"%s\"", name, 
00261                                          dfsch_inet_xml_escape(value)));
00262       break;
00263     default:
00264       dfsch_error("Invalid format of attribute", a);
00265     }
00266 
00267 
00268     attrs = DFSCH_FAST_CDR(attrs);
00269   }
00270 }
00271 
00272 static void emit_object(emitter_t* e, dfsch_object_t* o);
00273 
00274 static void emit_element(emitter_t* e, char* name, dfsch_object_t* children){
00275   dfsch_object_t* attrs = NULL;
00276   
00277   if (DFSCH_PAIR_P(children) && 
00278       DFSCH_PAIR_P(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(children)) &&
00279       DFSCH_FAST_CAR(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(children)) == at_symbol()){
00280     attrs = DFSCH_FAST_CDR(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(children));
00281     children = DFSCH_FAST_CDR(children);
00282   }
00283 
00284   e->write(e->target, "<");
00285   e->write(e->target, name);
00286   emit_attrs(e, attrs);
00287   if (children){
00288     e->write(e->target, ">");    
00289     while (DFSCH_PAIR_P(children)){
00290       emit_object(e, DFSCH_FAST_CAR(children));
00291       children = DFSCH_FAST_CDR(children);
00292     }
00293     e->write(e->target, dfsch_saprintf("</%s>", name));
00294   } else {
00295     e->write(e->target, " />");    
00296   }
00297 }
00298 
00299 static void emit_object(emitter_t* e, dfsch_object_t* o){
00300   if (dfsch_string_p(o)){
00301     e->write(e->target, dfsch_inet_xml_escape(dfsch_string_to_cstr(o)));
00302   } else if (DFSCH_PAIR_P(o)){
00303     emit_element(e, dfsch_symbol(DFSCH_FAST_CAR(o)), DFSCH_FAST_CDR(o));
00304   } else {
00305     dfsch_error("Invalid object in SXML infoset", o);
00306   }
00307 }
00308 
00309 static void emit_infoset(emitter_t* e, dfsch_object_t* infoset){
00310   if (e->params->xml_decl){
00311     e->write(e->target, "<?xml version=\"1.0\" ?>\n");
00312   }
00313   if (e->params->dtd_public && e->params->dtd_system){ 
00314     /* XML does not allow PUBLIC-only DTD*/
00315     e->write(e->target, 
00316              dfsch_saprintf("<!DOCTYPE PUBLIC \"%s\" \"%s\">", 
00317                             e->params->dtd_public,
00318                             e->params->dtd_system));    
00319   }
00320   emit_object(e, infoset);
00321 }
00322 
00323 char* dfsch_sxml_emit_cstr(dfsch_object_t* infoset,
00324                                dfsch_sxml_emitter_params_t* params){
00325   emitter_t* e = emit_init(params, dfsch_sl_create(), dfsch_sl_append);
00326   emit_infoset(e, infoset);
00327   return dfsch_sl_value(e->target);
00328 }
00329 void dfsch_sxml_emit_port(dfsch_object_t* infoset, dfsch_object_t* port,
00330                               dfsch_sxml_emitter_params_t* params){
00331   emitter_t* e = emit_init(params, port, dfsch_port_write_cstr);
00332   emit_infoset(e, infoset);
00333 }
00334 
00335 static void rfputs(FILE* f, char*s){
00336   if (fputs(s, f) == EOF){
00337     dfsch_error("fputs failed", NULL);
00338   }
00339 }
00340 
00341 void dfsch_sxml_emit_file(dfsch_object_t* infoset, char* filename,
00342                               dfsch_sxml_emitter_params_t* params){
00343   emitter_t* e;
00344   FILE* f = fopen(filename, "w");
00345   if (!f){
00346     dfsch_error("Cannot open file", 
00347                 dfsch_list(2,
00348                            dfsch_make_string_cstr(filename),
00349                            dfsch_make_string_cstr(strerror(errno))));
00350     
00351   }
00352   
00353   DFSCH_UNWIND {
00354     e = emit_init(params, f, rfputs);
00355     emit_infoset(e, infoset);
00356   } DFSCH_PROTECT {
00357     fclose(f);
00358   } DFSCH_PROTECT_END;
00359 }

00361 dfsch_sxml_emitter_params_t* dfsch_sxml_emitter_params(dfsch_object_t* args){
00362   dfsch_sxml_emitter_params_t* p = GC_NEW(dfsch_sxml_emitter_params_t);
00363   DFSCH_KEYWORD_PARSER_BEGIN(args);
00364   DFSCH_KEYWORD_GENERIC("pretty-print", p->pretty_print, DFSCH_TRUE_P);
00365   DFSCH_KEYWORD_GENERIC("xml-decl", p->xml_decl, DFSCH_TRUE_P);
00366   DFSCH_KEYWORD_GENERIC("dtd-public", p->dtd_public, dfsch_string_to_cstr);
00367   DFSCH_KEYWORD_GENERIC("dtd-system", p->dtd_system, dfsch_string_to_cstr);
00368   DFSCH_KEYWORD_GENERIC("prepend-string", p->prepend_string, 
00369                         dfsch_string_to_cstr);
00370   DFSCH_KEYWORD_PARSER_END(args);
00371   return p;
00372 }
